trans-unit.source: Defines methods a class implements to act as an implicit resource provider.
trans-unit.target: 定義類別 (Class) 實作的方法，用來做為隱含資源提供者。

trans-unit.source: Resources can be declared explicitly or implicitly within a page.
trans-unit.target: 資源可以明確或隱含地宣告在網頁內。

trans-unit.source: Implicit resources allow the developer to assign a collection of resource values to a control in one statement rather than assigning each value individually.
trans-unit.target: 隱含的資源可讓開發人員將資源值的集合指派至一個陳述式，而非個別指定每個值的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the page parser encounters an implicit resource in the form of `meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`, it assigns all the values with the `WelcomeLabel` resource key prefix to the corresponding values in the control.
trans-unit.target: 當頁面剖析器遇到隱含資源的形式`meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`，它會將指派的值與`WelcomeLabel`資源控制項中的對應值的索引鍵前置詞。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a resource file defines values for `WelcomeLabel.Text` and `WelcomeLabel.ToolTip`, those values would be assigned to a `Label` control with an implicit reference to `WelcomeLabel`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果資源檔中定義的值`WelcomeLabel.Text`和`WelcomeLabel.ToolTip`，這些值會指派給`Label`控制項的隱含參考`WelcomeLabel`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.IImplicitResourceProvider> interface defines the methods a resource provider implements to access implicit resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.IImplicitResourceProvider>介面會定義存取隱含資源的資源提供者實作的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a particular value using the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.IImplicitResourceProvider.GetObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得特定的值，使用<xref:System.Web.Compilation.IImplicitResourceProvider.GetObject%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you create a custom resource provider, you do not need to provide customized support for implicit resource localization.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立自訂資源提供者，您不需要提供自訂的支援隱含資源當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: Implicit localization will work with your resource provider.
trans-unit.target: 隱含當地語系化將適用於您的資源提供者。

trans-unit.source: The prefix of the implicit resource keys to be collected.
trans-unit.target: 要收集的隱含資源索引鍵之前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of implicit resource keys as specified by the prefix.
trans-unit.target: 取得依照前置詞指定的隱含資源索引鍵集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of implicit resource keys.
trans-unit.target: 隱含資源索引鍵的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />。

trans-unit.source: When implemented, the method returns a collection of implicit resource keys for a particular prefix.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，此方法會傳回隱含資源特定前置詞的索引鍵的集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, `WelcomeLabel` is specified as the prefix in the expression `meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`WelcomeLabel`指定運算式中的前置詞為`meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`。

trans-unit.source: Any properties in a local resource file with `WelcomeLabel` as a prefix should be returned with this method.
trans-unit.target: 本機資源檔中的任何屬性`WelcomeLabel`前置詞應該傳回此方法。

trans-unit.source: The resource key containing the prefix, filter, and property.
trans-unit.target: 資源索引鍵包含前置詞、篩選條件和屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that represents the culture for which the resource is localized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，表示資源要當地語系化的文化特性 (Culture)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object representing the value of the specified resource key.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，表示指定資源索引鍵的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the localized value of an implicit resource key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示隱含資源索引鍵的當地語系化值。

trans-unit.source: When implemented, the method returns the object for the value represented by the implicit resource key.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，方法會傳回隱含資源索引鍵所表示之值的物件。
